title: Kyrgyzstan: Women's rights protesters assaulted, by men
description: Activists gathered in Bishkek square to march against gender-based violence on International Women's Day.
content:
Police in Kyrgyzstan have detained dozens of protesters, mostly women, at a rally to mark International Women's Day after masked men attacked them and tore up their placards.
